Question: Scholars refer to the years between 1585 and 1592 as this person's "lost years".
Hints: Some scholars claim that members of this person's family were Catholics, at a time when Catholic practice was against the law.
In 1591 the authorities reported that John **** had missed church "for fear of process for debt", a common Catholic excuse.
In the last phase of his career, this person adopted many techniques to achieve these effects.
